description:
Cid gets a report from Nu about powerful cult members lurking in the Royal Capital. Too bad he’s too distracted about the upcoming fencing tournament to notice.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: A Fencing Tournament of Intrigue & Bloodshed
Bouryaku to Ryuuketsu no Kenjutsu Taikai
Le complot et le tournoi sanglant
謀略と流血の剣術大会
